text: Herbert David Kelleher (March 12, 1931 – January 3, 2019) was an American businessman. He was the co-founder, CEO, and Chairman Emeritus of Southwest Airlines. He was born in Camden, New Jersey. Kelleher died on January 3, 2019 in Dallas, Texas from prostate cancer at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Business Week – Herb Kelleher on the Record * Forbes – Southwest Airlines: Profit for peanuts * Nuts! title: Herb Kelleher
